mapper.select: insert into cc_cpn_issue (mbr_no, org_cpn_iss_no, sys_reg_dtime, sys_regr_id, sys_mod_dtime, sys_modr_id, prm_no ) select iss.mbr_no, iss.cpn_iss_no, now(), #{loginId}, now(), #{loginId}, iss.prm_no, case when cp.prm_priod_ccd = '10' then cp.prm_end_dt + interval '1 day' else iss.sys_mod_dtime + cp.prm_std_dd * interval '1 day' end prm_end_dt from cc_prm_base cp inner join cc_cpn_issue iss on cp.prm_no = iss.prm_no where 1 = 1 and iss.cpn_iss_no = #{cpnIssNo} and iss.mbr_no = #{mbrNo} and now() at time zone 'utc' < prm_end_dt and iss.cpn_use_dt is not null returning cpn_iss_no
